item.title: Java Code Quality Series - 001
item.description: Overview Let’s begin the journey to better and bug free code. This series would focus on writing code optimization and quality in java. Code Review and Code Quality Issue - 001 How we can simplify below code snippet SHORT NOTE ABOUT CODE SNIPPET Here, Payment Indicator means if you are doing online shopping or with Point of Sale at Shop. And, 1 corresponds to online shopping and 0 corresponds by Point of Sale.
